bibl.title: Bunnell and Bunnell v. Isbell. Memo from Petitioners
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image.

org.orgName: United States District Court For The Western District of Washington Northern Division

div1.p: To Thomas Kennedy Clerk of the Town of Garfield

You will please take notice that the undersigned Edgar Bunnell and Author Bunnell will move His Honor William G. Langford Judge of the First Judicial District of Washington. Territory holding Terms at Colfax in nd for the County of Whitman said Territory at Chambers in the Court House at Walla Walla on the 14th day of September A.D. 1888 at 10 o'clock a.m. or as soon thereafter as consel can be heard said day for a Writ of Habeas Corpus in the case of the Town of Garfield vs. Edgar Bunnell and Arthur Bunnell which said case was tried before the Police Judge of the Town of Garfield on the 8th day of September AD 1888
